amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to prohibit the Department of Veterans Affairs from using its funds to pay bonuses to senior executives in the VA Central Office.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 169, 1 Present (Roll no. 245).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 169, 1 Present (Roll no. 245).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
